Hotel.name: Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa in Las Vegas (Summerlin), you'll be close to Tournament Players Club and Badlands Golf Club. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Bear's Best Golf Club and Tivoli Village.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 811 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature separate bathtubs and showers, designer toiletries, and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy body treatments and facials. Gambling sorts can try their luck at the casino, while others may prefer a nightclub or a health club. Additional amenities include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and gift shops/newsstands. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the resort's 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a poolside bar, or a swim-up bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this resort consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary during limited hours.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the resort's 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a poolside bar, or a swim-up bar.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 18.3 km / 11.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Message.Text: A minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of $39.00 (plus tax) per room, per day, will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. The fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for but not a guarantee of the final amount due. For a detailed description of what is included in the mandatory fee, please see hotel policies or consult hotel directly.
Resort fees are extra and payable at the hotel.

Room No: 1

Red Rock -> Airport (drops off at the departures level): 7am, 9am, 11am, 1pm, 3pm, 5pm, and 7pm.
Airport -> Red Rock (picks up from Level 0, between north and south baggage claim areas): 8am, 10am, 12am, 2pm, 4pm, 6pm, 8pm, and 9pm.,Red Rock -> Fashion Show Mall (departs from Red Rock Valet): 11:10am, 1:10pm, 3:10pm, 5:10pm, 7:10pm and 9:10pm.
Fashion Show Mall -> Red Rock (picks up at Valet Circle on Fashion Show Drive): 11:40am, 1:40pm, 3:40pm, 5:40pm, 7:40 pm, and 9:40pm.,The minimum age required to check in is 21 years.,Airport transfer is available at no additional charge. In order to reserve the transfer, please inform the property of your arrival details upon completing the booking.,The property provides shuttle service to nearby areas. Kindly contact the property for more details.,The resort fee includes the following:
· Fitness facility access
· High-speed in-room internet access
· Airport and Las Vegas Strip shuttle service
· Shoe shine
· Unlimited local and toll-free telephone calls
· Access to more than 7,300 digital daily newspapers and magazines powered by PressReader,American Express, Visa, Euro/Mastercard, Diners Club, Discover

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
